title: Bunkercast XVII: Text or Tweet
itunes:title: Bunkercast XVII: Text or Tweet
description:
A bunker filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you the latest news around the NFL including Derrick Henry signing the franchise tag, the latest update with SoFi Stadium and some other BIG important news. Marc and Ricky set up Friday's segment of "Text or Tweet" where the heroes have to send a tweet or text to someone that might make things a little awkward.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
